review: Wifi receiver doesn't seem that strong. Must keep power cord plugged in. Would prefer a way to plug in ethernet. All in all it's pretty convenient though.
author: josh

review: Wicked cool device. Rrally allowed our family to take advantage of prime video, prime music and pandora.  Works great, simple to install. Even some games for the kids. And for 20 bucks on prime day....no.complaints here.
author: Gargoyle

review: Works as advertised.  The fast start feature seems to depend on very fast data rates.  I reliably get 20 MB/sec, but still it gripes and jitters a little on starting a stream.  But after that it works flawless.  I turned off the gripe and am very happy with it.
author: James Hendrix Jr.

review: Awesome buy. For an awesome price.
author: ALFREDO I RODRIGUEZ

review: Arrived quickly and was easy for set up. Noticed that it didn't turn on right away so I used the included HDMI extention. Turned on immediately after. Using it daily without any issues.
author: Nonomex

review: Just as good as the Fire TV and faster than Apple TV!
author: Patrick Fenoughty

review: Does what it's supposed to do. Haven't figured out yet how to bring Google pages up from my laptop. Anyone know?
author: Reader700

review: great for my home office. easy set up. love the home screen. Just wish it had TWC app, then it would be prefect
author: Layasgrand
